videos.description: A demonstration of some common position in the ally game.
videos.author: O'Shane McKenzie

videos.title: Catch Me if you can
videos.description: A demonstration of common King vs King end games.

videos.title: Interesting Variations.
videos.description: A video explaining an interesting position where white sacrafices a piece to gain an advantage.
videos.author: Everton Williams (Bookman)

videos.title: Random Opening Tutorial 1
videos.description: An educational tutorial on a specific random opening, explaining how piece placements affect the game and what optimal responses are, while introducing concepts like “periscope,” “periphery,” “Kintoff line,” and “Trev zone.”
videos.author: Everton Williams (Bookman)
